sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SCENOGRAPHY, (from the Greek, σχηνη ſcene, and deſcription), in perſpective, a repreſentation of
a body on a perſpective plane; or a deſcription thereof
in all its dimenſions, ſuch as it appears to the eye. See P erspecTIve.
